data.title: THE CONTINENT MAKERS AND OTHER TALES OF THE VIAGENS by De Camp, L. Sprague: Very Good Hardcover (1953) First edition., Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - First edition. - Hardcover - Twayne Publishers Inc., New York - 1953 - Condition: Very Good - Good - From the library of Winona McClintic with her signature on the front and rear paste-down endpapers. McClintic was the author of science fiction short stories and poetry which appeared in "Best Of" collections and sf magazines. Very good in good to very good dust jacket with two one inch deep chips to the spine panel ends. - THE CONTINENT MAKERS AND OTHER TALES OF THE VIAGENS

Terms of Sale:

CONDITIONS OF SALE

Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal and personal checks accepted. All books, with few exceptions, will be covered in clear dust jacket sleeves (Brodarts). Packages will be adequately protected so as to prevent any damage during shipment. All orders are subject to prior sale. Orders will be reserved for a maximum of ten days. All books are returnable for any reason within ten days. Institutions may receive deferred billing.
